static_fields.name: Buy Windows Hakose Urushi | Minase Watches | Japan Made
static_fields.description: Windows Hakose is handmade in Japan. Hakose used urushi lacquer, paint and metal powder to decorate the dials.

hasVariant.name: Windows Hakose Rose Gold
hasVariant.description: The design pays tribute to Japanese nature. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Seven Windows model. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki. 18K gold.

offers.description: The design pays tribute to Japanese nature. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Seven Windows model. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki. 18K gold.
